titleStmt.title: Vox Dei & hominis. God's call from heaven ecchoed [sic] by mans answer from earth. Or a survey of effectual calling. In the [brace] explication of its nature. Distribution of it into its parts. Illustration of it by its properties. Confirmation of it by reasons. Application of it by uses. Being the substance of several sermons delivered to the people of Heveningham, in Suffolk. / By J. Votier, minister of the gospel.
Vox Dei et hominis
titleStmt.author: Votier, J. (James), b. 1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for Nathanael Webb, and William Grantham at the Bear in Paul's Church-yard, neer the little north door of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Includes: errata leaf, contents, and publisher's advertisement at end.
"Explication .. uses" are bracketed together on title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
